p: Carotenoids extracted from Goji were added to EVOO at a concentration of 1.5 mg/100 g oil (EVOOCar), according to a previous paper [ 26]. To improve the extract dispersion in oil, the EVOOCar sample was sonicated for 2 min and then shaded for 10 min. Finally, the sample appeared homogeneous and without particulate matter. EVOO and EVOOCar were immediately analyzed and represented the sample at time zero.
